parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Well, my name is Esperanza Huayama Aguirre,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: from the village of Rodeo Pampa,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they took several of us to the policlinic,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they gathered more than a hundred women there

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that day when that committee came,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: it was like being in a prison.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and when some women saw how others were crying with the pain

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but we were already inside and they wouldn’t let us leave.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and then they brought me to do the sterilisation

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because God didn’t want my baby to die at that moment,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I said to them: ‘I don’t want you to remove my baby,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I’d rather die with my baby,
